name: Hi-Speedroid Hagoita
effectText:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner monsters
(Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; increase the Levels of all monsters currently on the field by 1, until the end of this turn. If this card is in your GY and you control a "Speedroid" Tuner monster: You can Special Summon this card, also you cannot Special Summon for the rest of this turn, except WIND monsters. You can only use this effect of "Hi-Speedroid Hagoita" once per turn.
